= Contributor Page =

This page contains information useful to developers working on Seattle.   Anything that is essential for each developer to read is '''in bold text'''.

Note: We've recently moved our VCS and ticket system to !GitHub. Please see [https://github.com/SeattleTestbed our organization's page] there for the latest code, to discuss open issues, and to create forks off our code base for your contributions!

'''If you are a new contributor, please look at our [wiki:GettingStarted Getting Started] page.'''
